Cast ability Inflict Disease (An enemy suffers Diseased (Degrade Constitution by 2, degrade all saves by 2, On turn end, Deal 1d4 necrotic damage to self).) on an enemy. Inspire Inspire your allies, granting them a +2 bonus to attack rolls for the next 3 rounds. Grant all allies Inspired (Improve to hit by 2, Gain 5 temporary HP, improve all saves by 1). Maul Make a powerful attack that deals 1d6 + strength modifier extra damage and inflicts Bleed on a successful hit. Attack an enemy; Deal 1d6 + statMod(#str) bludgeoning damage to an enemy; An enemy suffers Bleeding (On turn end, Deal 1d2 bleed damage to self); An enemy suffers Slow (Degrade Dexterity by 5, degrade initiative by 10, degrade attacks per turn by 1). Meditate Enter a meditative state. Grant yourself Meditating (Cannot take actions, improve Save versus Magic by 2, 25% resistance to Force, On turn end, Heal self 1d2 + #level HP). Melee Attack Use your primary weapon. Attack an enemy. Overwatch Make an attack of opportunity against the first enemy that melee attacks you or an ally before your next turn. Grant yourself Overwatching (Improve bonus damage by 2, On enemy melee, Attack attacker; Purge self of Overwatching). Poison Bite Bite an enemy, dealing 1d4 damage and poisoning them. Deal 1d4 poison damage to an enemy. Poison Weapon Coat your weapon in poison for your next 2 attacks. Grant yourself poisoning blade (On attack hit, Self suffers Poison (On turn end, Deal 1d4 true damage to self) for 3 turns). Prepare Charge Prepare to charge on your next turn, gaining +2 to hit and +2 damage. Grant yourself Preparing to Charge (Improve to hit by 2, improve bonus damage by 2, Next move compelled to be charge, On attack, Remove Preparing to Charge from self for 1 turn). Ranged Attack Fire your primary weapon. Attack an enemy. Rapid Strike Quickly inflict damage. Attack an enemy; Attack an enemy; Attack an enemy. Reckless Attack Make a powerful double attack that deals +2 damage each, but you take -2 to hit and +2 AC for 2 rounds. Attack an enemy; Attack an enemy; Self suffers Reckless (Degrade to hit by 2, degrade AC by 2). Roundhouse Kick Make a powerful kick that strikes all enemies for 1d4 + 1 + level/3 bludgeoning damage. Deal 1d4+1+round(#level/3) bludgeoning damage to all enemies. Second Wind Regain 1d10 + level hit points. Heal yourself 1d10 + #level HP. Sets Spear Brace your spear to intercept a charging enemy, dealing 3d8 damage and granting +4 to hit when they charge you next turn. Grant yourself Braced (On enemy charge, Deal 3d8+1 piercing damage to self for 2 turns). Smash Unleash a powerful blow. Deal 2d6 + #level bludgeoning damage to an enemy. Smoke Screen Create a smoke screen that grants all allies within it evasion and 4 AC for 3 rounds. Grant your party Hidden (Improve AC by 4, improve evasion by 10, On attack, Remove Hidden from self). Stomp Stomp the ground, dealing 1d6 bludgeoning damage to all adjacent enemies and knocking them prone. Deal 1d6 bludgeoning damage to all enemies; All enemies suffer Prone (Cannot take actions, degrade Dexterity by 2). Call Animal Companion A friendly animal comes to your aid in battle. Summon animal. Taunt Taunt an enemy, forcing them to target you on their next turn. An enemy suffers Taunted (Next target forced to be you). Trickfire Toss a firebomb that damages and confuses enemies. Deal 1d4 fire damage to all enemies; All enemies suffer Confused (Actions are random). Wait Wait and do nothing this turn. Does nothing. Whirlwind Attack Swing your weapon in a wide arc, attacking all enemies within reach. Attack all enemies.

Acid Arrow

1 School of Conjuration Fire an arrow of acid, dealing 1d4 damage and applying Acid Burn. Deal 1d4 acid damage to an enemy.

Acid Spray

2 School of Conjuration Spray a cone of acid, dealing 2d6 damage to all enemies in the area and applying Acid Burn. Deal 2d6 acid damage to all enemies.

Apocalypse

9 School of Evocation Unleash a cataclysmic storm of elemental fury upon all enemies. Deal 6d6 fire damage to all enemies; Deal 6d6 cold damage to all enemies; Deal 6d6 lightning damage to all enemies; All enemies suffer Doomed (Degrade all stats by 4 for 3 turns).

Mage Armor

1 School of Abjuration Arcane force wraps around you, providing magical protection. Grant yourself Mage-Armored (Improve AC by 4, Gain 20 temporary HP).

Blur

2 School of Illusion You are out of focus, making it harder for enemies to hit you. Grant yourself Blurred (Improve Save versus Magic by 2, improve AC by 1, improve evasion by 10).

Burning Hands

1 School of Evocation Unleash a cone of fire, dealing 1d6 damage to all enemies in the area. Deal 1d6 fire damage to all enemies.

Chain Lightning

4 School of Evocation Strike multiple enemies with lightning. Deal 2d6+#level lightning damage to an enemy cascading =3+floor(#level/2) times.

Chaos Bolt

3 School of Evocation Hurl a bolt of chaotic energy that deals random types of damage. Apply one of the following random effects to an enemy: Deal 2d6 fire damage to an enemy; Deal 2d6 cold damage to an enemy; Deal 2d6 acid damage to an enemy; Deal 2d6 poison damage to an enemy.

Confuse

3 School of Illusion Confuse an enemy, causing them to act randomly. An enemy suffers Confused (Actions are random).

Dancing Lights

Cantrip School of Illusion Create small lights that hover and move. All enemies suffer Distracted (Degrade to hit by 1, degrade bonus damage by 1, degrade evasion by 5); All enemies suffer Blinded (Degrade to hit by 4, degrade evasion by 10, degrade all rolls by 2).

Detonation

Cantrip School of Evocation Countdown to a fiery explosion. Grant yourself Ticking (On expire, Deal 2d6 fire damage to enemies; Instantly kill self for 3 turns).

Disintegrate

5 School of Evocation A green ray that dematerializes living forms leaps from your fingertips. Deal 10d6 force damage to an enemy.

Dispel Magic

2 School of Abjuration Remove all effects. Remove .* from yourself or an ally or an enemy.

Disruption

4 School of Abjuration Imbue a weapon with disruptive energy especially harmful to undead and constructs. Grant yourself or an ally Disrupting (On attack, Deal 2d6 true damage to target; Deal 3d6 radiant damage to target if undead

Drench

3 School of Transmutation Drench an enemy, reducing their attack rolls by 2 for 3 rounds. An enemy suffers Drenched (Degrade to hit by 2, 100% vulnerability to Lightning, 200% vulnerability to Cold).

Earthquake

5 School of Evocation Cause the ground to shake. Deal 2d6 bludgeoning damage to all enemies; All enemies suffer Prone (Cannot take actions, degrade Dexterity by 2).

False Life

4 School of Necromancy Grant yourself temporary hit points. Grant yourself False Life (Gain =10d6 + 2 * #level temporary HP).

Fireball

6 School of Evocation Hurl a destructive ball of energy that explodes in a fiery blast. Deal 6d6 fire damage to all enemies.

Firebolt

Cantrip School of Evocation A small bolt of fire shoots from your fingertips. Deal 1d3 fire damage to an enemy.

Flesh to Stone

6 School of Transmutation Turn an enemy to stone. An enemy suffers Petrified (Cannot take actions, Immunity to Fear, Immunity to Charm, Immunity to Stun, Immunity to Sleep, Immunity to Poison, Immunity to Disease).

Fly

3 School of Transmutation Grant the ability to fly for a short duration. Grant yourself or an ally Flight (Improve evasion by 20, improve AC by 5).

Frostbite

Cantrip School of Evocation A chilling blast of cold air. Deal 1d4 cold damage to an enemy.

Ghost Touch

Cantrip School of Transmutation Induce necrosis with your touch. Grant yourself Ghost Touch (On attack hit, Deal 1d3 necrotic damage to target).

Haste

5 School of Transmutation Increase an ally's speed. Grant an ally Haste (Improve Dexterity by 4, improve initiative by 10, improve attacks per turn by 1, improve AC by 2).

Implosion

8 School of Evocation Create a powerful gravitational collapse at a target location, damaging all enemies within the area. Deal 10d6 force damage to all enemies.

Invisibility

6 School of Illusion Turn invisible for 5 rounds or until you attack or cast a spell. Grant yourself or an ally Invisible (Invisible, On attack, Remove Invisible from self, On offensive casting, Remove Invisible from self).

Lightning Bolt

4 School of Evocation Strike random enemies with lightning, dealing 1d8 damage and paralyzing them for 1 round. Deal 1d8 electric damage to 2 random enemies; 2 random enemies suffer Paralyzed (Cannot take actions, degrade Strength by 5, degrade Dexterity by 5).

Magebane

2 School of Abjuration Create an aura that harms enemy spellcasters when they cast spells. Grant an enemy Magebane (On enemy casting, Deal 2d6 true damage to caster for 3 turns).

Maze

8 School of Conjuration Banish an enemy to a labyrinthine demiplane for up to 10 minutes. An enemy suffers In Maze (Cannot take actions, Untargetable).

Meteor Swarm

9 School of Evocation Summon a swarm of meteors that strike multiple enemies, causing massive fire and bludgeoning damage. Deal 8d6 fire damage to =5 + floor(#level / 2) random enemies; Deal 2d6 bludgeoning damage to =5 + floor(#level / 2) random enemies.

Minor Ward

Cantrip School of Abjuration Create a magical ward that absorbs damage. Grant yourself Minor Warded (Improve Save versus Magic by 1, 25% resistance to Force, Gain =7 + #level temporary HP).

Mirror Image

2 School of Illusion Illusory duplicates confound attackers Grant yourself Mirror Images (Improve AC by 2, improve all saves by 2, improve evasion by 15).

Magic Missile

1 School of Evocation Fire three magical bolts that automatically hit and deal 1d3 damage each (more bolts and damage at higher levels). Deal 1d3 + floor(#level/3) force damage to 2 + round(#level/2) random enemies.

Obscuring Mist

3 School of Conjuration Create a mist that obscures vision. Grant yourself Hidden (Improve AC by 4, improve evasion by 10, On attack, Remove Hidden from self).

Paralyzing Touch

2 School of Necromancy Touch an enemy to paralyze them for 2 rounds. An enemy suffers Paralyzed (Cannot take actions, degrade Strength by 5, degrade Dexterity by 5).

Plane Shift

7 School of Conjuration Transport yourself and your party to another plane of existence. Planeshift yourself to =oneOf(Arcadia, Cthelll, Gehenna, Hades, Limbo, Mechanus, Pandemonium, Ysgard, Zephyrus).

Poison Cloud

5 School of Conjuration Release a cloud of toxic gas. Deal 3d4+#level poison damage to all enemies.

Polar Ray

4 School of Evocation Fire a beam of intense cold that can freeze enemies in place. Deal 5d6 cold damage to an enemy.

Polymorph Other

5 School of Transmutation Transform an enemy into a harmless creature for a short duration. An enemy suffers Polymorphed (Displayed name changed to "Sheep", attack die set to 1d2, MAXHP set to 5, AC set to 10, STR set to 2, CON set to 2, DEX set to 2, INT set to 2, WIS set to 2, CHA set to 2); Recalculate HP for target.

Prismatic Spray

1 School of Evocation A dazzling array of multicolored beams springs from your hand. Cycle through the following effects on =5 + round(#level / 2) random enemies: Deal 1d3+1 fire damage to enemy; Deal 1d4 cold damage to enemy; Deal 1d2 acid damage to enemy; Deal 1d3 lightning damage to enemy; Deal 1d3 poison damage to enemy; Deal 1d4 psychic damage to enemy; Deal 1d2+1 radiant damage to enemy; Deal 1d2 necrotic damage to enemy.

Ray of Frost

2 School of Evocation Fire a ray of frost, dealing 1d4 damage and reducing the target's speed by 10 feet for 3 rounds. Deal 1d4 cold damage to an enemy.

Reflection

5 School of Abjuration Create a magical shield that reflects some incoming damage. Grant yourself Reflect (Add 50% to damage reflection percent).

Sandstorm

4 School of Evocation Create a swirling sandstorm that damages and blinds enemies within it for 3 rounds. Deal 2d6 bludgeoning damage to all enemies; All enemies suffer Blinded (Degrade to hit by 4, degrade evasion by 10, degrade all rolls by 2).

Scald

2 School of Evocation Blast an enemy with superheated steam. Deal 3d6 fire damage to an enemy; An enemy suffers Scalded (Degrade all rolls by 1).

Shock Pulse

Cantrip School of Evocation Release a pulse of electrical energy that arcs to additional targets. Deal 1d4 lightning damage to an enemy cascading =1+floor(#level/2) times.

Shocking Grasp

1 School of Evocation Deliver a jolt of electricity. Deal 1d6 lightning damage to an enemy.

Silence

3 School of Illusion Create an area of silence, preventing spellcasting for 3 rounds. All enemies suffer Silence (Cannot cast spells).

Sleep

1 School of Enchantment Lull enemies into a magical slumber. All enemies suffer Asleep (Cannot take actions).

Slow

3 School of Transmutation Reduce the speed of your foes. All enemies suffer Slow (Degrade Dexterity by 5, degrade initiative by 10, degrade attacks per turn by 1).

Soot Cloud

Cantrip School of Conjuration Create a cloud of soot that reveals hidden or invisible creatures. Remove hidden

Sound Lance

5 School of Evocation A concentrated blast of noise explodes from your hand. Deal 4d6 sonic damage to an enemy.

Spark

Cantrip School of Evocation A small jolt of electricity. Deal 1d3 lightning damage to an enemy.

Spellturning

7 School of Abjuration Create a magical barrier may reflect spells back to their caster. Grant yourself Spellturn (Add 50% to spell reflection chance).

Stone to Flesh

6 School of Transmutation Restore a petrified creature to flesh. Remove Petrified from an ally.

Summon Elemental

4 School of Conjuration Summon a random elemental to fight for you. Summon of class Elemental monster.

Summon Monster I

3 School of Conjuration Summon a random monster (beast or fey type) to fight for you. Summon of class =oneOf(beast, fey) monster.

Summon Undead

3 School of Conjuration Summon a random undead creature to fight for you. Summon npc.

Time Stop

8 School of Transmutation Stop time for everyone but yourself. Grant yourself Time Stopped (Improve extra turns by 3, Does not trigger reactions).

True Sight

6 School of Divination See through illusions, invisibility, and magical darkness for 10 minutes. Grant yourself or an ally True Sight (Can perceive invisible entities).

Arcane Ward

1 School of Abjuration Conjure a magical absorption ward. Grant yourself or an ally Warded (Improve Save versus Magic by 1, 15% resistance to Fire, 15% resistance to Cold, 15% resistance to Lightning, 50% resistance to Force, Gain =14 + 2 * #level temporary HP).

Warp Enemy

7 School of Transmutation Distort the fabric of reality around an enemy, causing unpredictable effects. Apply one of the following random effects to an enemy: An enemy suffers Stunned (Cannot take actions, degrade all rolls by 2); An enemy suffers Slow (Degrade Dexterity by 5, degrade initiative by 10, degrade attacks per turn by 1); An enemy suffers Weakened (Degrade Strength by 2, degrade bonus damage by 2); An enemy suffers Distracted (Degrade to hit by 1, degrade bonus damage by 1, degrade evasion by 5); Apply one of the following random effects to an enemy: An enemy suffers Cursed (Degrade all stats by 1); An enemy suffers Insane (Actions are random, degrade all rolls by 1, degrade Save versus Will by 2); An enemy suffers Charmed (Allegiance changed); An enemy suffers Frightened (Degrade to hit by 2, degrade initiative by 5, degrade all rolls by 1, degrade all saves by 2).

Aegis of Faith

5 life domain Ward against all effects. Grant yourself Invulnerable (Untargetable).

Animate Dead

Cantrip death domain Bind souls to your service. Restore a fallen ally to life with 40% health.

Anoint

1 life domain You mark your allies with a holy symbol, granting them protection. Grant all allies Anointed (50% resistance to Radiant, improve bonus damage by 1, improve to hit by 1, improve all saves by 2).

Barkskin

2 nature domain Your skin stiffens into tree-bark. Grant yourself Barkskin (Improve AC by 2).

Black Ritual

Cantrip death domain A profane ritual summons a monstrous undead creature to serve you. Grant yourself Summoning (On expire, Summon level 10 monster for 3 turns).

Blade Barrier

5 law domain Create a wall of spinning blades that damages enemies passing through it. Grant yourself Blade Barrier (On enemy melee, Deal 3d6 slashing damage to attacker; Purge self of Blade Barrier for 5 turns).

Bless

1 life domain Bless an ally, granting them a divine boon. Grant yourself or an ally Blessed (Improve to hit by 1, improve bonus damage by 1).

Command

4 law domain Give an instruction. Force an enemy to flee.

Consecrated Ground

3 life domain Consecrate the ground, damaging enemies who attack or cast spells near you. Grant yourself Consecrated (On enemy offensive casting, Purge self of Consecrated; Deal 2d6 radiant damage to caster, On enemy attack, Purge self of Consecrated; Deal 2d6 radiant damage to attacker for 5 turns).

Cure Light Wounds

1 life domain Bind moderate injuries. Heal yourself or an ally 1d8 HP.

Cure Critical Wounds

6 life domain Bind critical injuries. Heal yourself or an ally 4d8 HP.

Cure Disease

3 life domain Cure an ally of disease. Remove Diseased from an ally.

Cure Minor Wounds

Cantrip life domain Bind minor injuries. Heal yourself or an ally 1d4 HP.

Cure Moderate Wounds

3 life domain Bind moderate injuries. Heal yourself or an ally 2d8 HP.

Cure Serious Wounds

4 life domain Bind serious injuries. Heal yourself or an ally 3d8 HP.

Curse

Cantrip death domain Curse an enemy. An enemy suffers Cursed (Degrade all stats by 1).

Daylight

4 light domain Create a sphere of bright light. Deal 1d4 radiant damage to all enemies; Purge all enemies of Hidden.

Death

9 death domain Utter a power word in the blackest of tongues. Instantly kill an enemy.

Death Touch

4 death domain Touch an enemy to curse them. Deal 3d6 necrotic damage to an enemy; An enemy suffers Cursed (Degrade all stats by 1).

Harm

6 death domain Inflict severe necrotic damage on an enemy. Deal 6d6 + #level * 2 necrotic damage to an enemy.

Heal Ally

1 life domain Offer restoration. Heal an ally 1d4 HP.

Hold Person

2 law domain Paralyze an enemy for 4 rounds. An enemy suffers Paralyzed (Cannot take actions, degrade Strength by 5, degrade Dexterity by 5) if humanoid.

Holy

6 law domain Smite your foes with holy energy. Deal 3d6 + #wis radiant damage to all enemies; All enemies suffer Deafened (50% resistance to Sonic, degrade bonus damage by 2, degrade AC by 2, degrade to hit by 2, degrade all saves by 1).

Ironskin

6 nature domain Your skin becomes as hard as iron. Grant yourself Ironskin (Improve AC by 5).

Judgment

5 law domain Call down divine judgment on an enemy. Deal 6d6 radiant damage to an enemy; An enemy suffers Blinded (Degrade to hit by 4, degrade evasion by 10, degrade all rolls by 2); An enemy suffers Marked for Judgment (On heal, Deal 1d6 radiant damage to self for 5 turns).

Life Drain

1 death domain Drain life from an enemy, healing yourself for damage dealt. Drain an enemy 1d6 HP.

Madness

7 chaos domain Drive an enemy insane. An enemy suffers Insane (Actions are random, degrade all rolls by 1, degrade Save versus Will by 2).

Mass Curse

Cantrip death domain Your venomous words fill your enemies with a sense of doom. All enemies suffer Cursed (Degrade all stats by 1).

Prayer

2 life domain Bolster your team with a prayer. Grant your party Praying (Improve to hit by 1, improve all saves by 2, improve bonus healing by 2, Gain 10 temporary HP).

Protection from Evil

1 law domain Grant immunity to charm and fear for 6 rounds. Grant an ally Protected (50% resistance to Necrotic, Immunity to Charm); Grant an ally Courage (Improve all saves by 2, Immunity to Fear).

Raise Dead

4 life domain Restore life to the dead. Restore a fallen ally to life with 50% health.

Rally

3 life domain Restore your team's spirit. Heal all allies 1d6 HP.

Remove Fear

1 life domain Calm a frightened ally. Remove Frightened from an ally.

Resist Fire

2 life domain Grant an ally resistance to fire damage for 5 rounds. Grant an ally Fireproof (50% resistance to Fire).

Resurrection

7 life domain It's alive! Restore a fallen ally to life with full health.

Scaleskin

8 nature domain Your skin takes on the qualities of dragon scales. Grant yourself Scaleskin (Improve AC by 8, 25% resistance to Fire).

Shield of Faith

2 law domain Divine power protects you or an ally with a shimmering shield. Grant yourself or an ally Shielded (Improve AC by 1, Gain 10 temporary HP, improve Save versus Magic by 1).

Smite Evil

1 war domain Smite an enemy. Deal #level + 1d8 radiant damage to an enemy.

Steelskin

9 nature domain Your skin becomes as tough as steel. Grant yourself Steelskin (Improve AC by 10, 50% resistance to Piercing, 50% resistance to Slashing).

Stoneskin

3 nature domain Your skin hardens like stone. Grant yourself Stoneskin (Improve AC by 3).

Summon Lich

5 death domain Summon a powerful lich to fight for you. Summon level 10 monster.

Sunburst

5 light domain A brilliant burst of solar energy injures your foes. Deal 4d6 radiant damage to all enemies.

Sunmark

Cantrip light domain Light up an enemy with a radiant mark. Deal 1d3 radiant damage to an enemy; An enemy suffers Sunmarked (Degrade Save versus Magic by 1, 25% vulnerability to Fire, 25% vulnerability to Radiant, On attacked, Deal 1d4 radiant damage to self).

Terror

2 death domain Frighten an enemy. An enemy suffers Frightened (Degrade to hit by 2, degrade initiative by 5, degrade all rolls by 1, degrade all saves by 2).

Turn Undead

2 light domain The dead recoil from your holy presence. Force all enemies to flee if undead.
